bibl.title: Monastic Pilgrimage Centre at Kellia in Egypt.
bibl.note: Kellia, Qusur Hegeila, Kom 39-40: the evolution of the complex starting with a primitive hermitage (probably first half of the 5th century) up to the appearance of a significant cult centre.

bibl.title: Akten des XII. Internationalen Kongresses für christliche Archäologie. Bonn 22.-28. September 1991. Teil II

bibl.seg: MAKOWIECKA Elzbieta, Monastic Pilgrimage Centre at Kellia in Egypt.

Akten des XII. Internationalen Kongresses für christliche Archäologie. Bonn 22.-28. September 1991. Teil II = Studi di Antichità cristiana. 52 = JAC. Ergänzungsband 20, 2 (Münster, 1995) pp. 1002-1015, 10 plans.
Kellia, Qusur Hegeila, Kom 39-40: the evolution of the complex starting with a primitive hermitage (probably first half of the 5th century) up to the appearance of a significant cult centre.
